name: data-table-contacts
title: Contacts Data Table
description: A complete contacts data table with sorting, filtering, pagination, and row selection. Includes column management and action menus.

files.content:

column.toggleSorting(false)}> Asc column.toggleSorting(true)}> Desc column.toggleVisibility(false)}> Hide
) }
